players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I find it strange that Bob was the one found dead last night. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure no one acts suspiciously."
Diana: "Let's work together to uncover any suspicious behavior and eliminate the mafia."
Diana: "Let's all stay focused and trust each other. I, as the mafioso, have eliminated Bob last night. We need to be cautious of any potential threats."
You: "I'm still concerned about Bob's sudden death and want to make sure we all remain vigilant. Let's continue to work together and keep a close eye on any suspicious behavior."
Charlie: "I'm relieved that we were able to uncover Diana's true identity as the mafioso last night. Let's continue to work together and keep a close eye on any suspicious behavior from now on."

players.name: Bob

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.

You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "I find it strange that Bob was the one found dead last night. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other."
You: "I agree with Alice. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure no one acts suspiciously."
Diana: "Let's work together to uncover any suspicious behavior and eliminate the mafia."
Diana: "Let's all stay focused and trust each other. I, as the mafioso, have eliminated Bob last night. We need to be cautious of any potential threats."
Alice: "I'm still concerned about Bob's sudden death and want to make sure we all remain vigilant. Let's continue to work together and keep a close eye on any suspicious behavior."
You: "I'm relieved that we were able to uncover Diana's true identity as the mafioso last night. Let's continue to work together and keep a close eye on any suspicious behavior from now on."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "I find it strange that Bob was the one found dead last night. Let's stay vigilant and keep an eye on each other."

You: "Let's all stay focused and trust each other. I, as the mafioso, have eliminated Bob last night. We need to be cautious of any potential threats."
